recipe.title: Coconut and Peanut Butter Easter Eggs
recipe.ingredients: 1 pkg shredded coconut 1 lb. confectioners sugar 1 1/2 cups peanut butter (crunchy or smooth) 1 box bakers chocolate (semi sweet) 1/8 lb. parafin
recipe.steps: Mix together coconut, confectioners sugar and peanut butter until well combined. Roll into small egg shaped bites. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden; let stand 1 hour. Melt chocolate and parafin in a double boiler. Watch that the water doesn't boil. Dip eggs in melted chocolate and place on waxed paper; refrigerat Cool and cut into bars.
